roleset.name: choose, pick

roles.note: Other args did not appear with noun instances thus far, see verb entry for further information.

example.name: Arg 0, within LVC
example.text: Here , however , the education system gives children-1 hardly any opportunity for *PRO*-1 making choices , and education is foisted on them rather than being something they seek for themselves .

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: This time around, Trista Rehn, the most famous of the runners-up on the original Bachelor, was given her choice of eligible men from a selection of 25.

roleset.note: Based on verb entry choose.01. Corresponds to VNcls get-13.5.1.
